title: AirBnb
description: This unique apartment of 69 m2 will comfortably accommodate 8 people. It is an excellent option for a family or a group of friends looking for a comfortable place to stay in Warsaw. The interiors are carefully decorated, functional and filled with natural light thanks to large windows. Appropriately selected additions create a homely and cosy atmosphere, while the light colour scheme gives the interior spaciousness and freshness, creating a space conducive to relaxation. The layout of the rooms includes a living room with kitchenette, two bedrooms, a balcony and a bathroom. The living area impresses with its comfort, where two, soft sofas with a sleeping function invite you to relax and unwind. The living room leads out onto a furnished balcony, where you can enjoy your morning coffee prepared in the available coffee machine. The kitchenette has been designed in a functional and elegant way, with modern appliances and furniture creating a harmonious whole with the rest of the flat. The master bedroom, with its double bed, is a cosy space that provides a peaceful night's sleep and recuperation after an eventful day. Between the living room and the bedroom with a bunk bed, there is an additional bedroom space with a double bed, which is separated from the rest of the apartment thanks to long curtains. The bathroom with shower has a hairdryer and a washing machine, which adds significantly to the comfort of the stay. Evening entertainment is provided by multimedia, such as a flat-screen Smart TV, a projector, as well as Wi-Fi access. For a good start, guests are provided with complimentary toiletries, towels and bed linen. In addition, it is possible to come to the apartment with your pet.

title: Starbucks
description: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

title: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.

title: Pub Crawl
description: Whether you’re looking to meet new people or would just like to know where to go for drink, spice up your night—and your life—on a fun-packed tour of Warsaw’s best bars and clubs. Visit various venues for a free drink and excellent discounts before ending the night with skip-the-line entry to a popular nightclub.

title: Indoor Shooting Range
description: Visit Warszawa Shooting Range in Warsaw and learn to shoot a range of firearms under the guidance of a professional instructor. With this 45-minute shooting package, fire six different guns from distances of 5, 10, 15, and 20 meters, including an AK 47, a CZ 75 Kadet pistol, a Glock 17, a Colt 1911, and a shotgun.

title: Go Karting
description: Fast go-kart racetrack with training, plus conference & meeting spaces for team-building sessions.

title: SCity Club
description: Special place
